title: Alita: Battle Angel
description: A deactivated cyborg is revived, but cannot remember anything of her past life and goes on a quest to find out who she is.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer runs into challenges as his drug empire grows.

title: Frozen II
description: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf, and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land.

title: Stranger Things
description: A group of young kids in a small town unearths a series of supernatural mysteries, involving secret experiments and terrifying creatures.
